description.name: 1/4" impact magnetic socket nut screwdriver 8mm x 48mm
description.long_desc:
Impact Magnetic Socket 8mm x 48mm 1/4" – Precision and Stability


The Tvardy 8mm x 48mm 1/4" Impact Magnetic Socket is designed for fast and precise screw installation. With its solid construction and strong magnet, it ensures stability and ease of use, minimizing the risk of dropped screws.


Thanks to its high durability and precision design, the Tvardy 8mm x 48mm 1/4" magnetic impact socket is an essential tool for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Its impact-resistant build guarantees long service life and optimal performance, even under demanding conditions.


Key Features:



  • 48mm Total Length – Ideal for various assembly and fastening tasks.

  • Strong Magnet – Securely holds screws and bolts, eliminating the need for constant adjustments.

  • Impact-Resistant Construction – Designed for heavy-duty use with impact drivers.

  • Standard 1/4" HEX Shank – Compatible with most power tools available on the market.

description.name: Propane butane gas connection set – regulator, hose clamps and 2m hose
description.long_desc:
Connection Kit for Propane-Butane Gas


Thanks to its design and compliance with EN16129 and EN12864 standards, this kit ensures safety and reliability in gastronomy, workshops, industry, and domestic applications.


Simple Construction:
The gas regulator features a straightforward, classic design that enables easy installation and reliable operation in standard gas systems.


Precise Regulation:
The preset output pressure of 37 mbar ensures stable and safe operation of gas appliances.


Versatile Use:
Compatible with hoses of 9-10 mm diameter and equipped with a left-threaded 1/2" fitting.


Safety Standards:
Compliant with European standards EN16129 and EN12864, the product guarantees high-quality construction and safe use.


High Performance:
With a maximum gas flow of 1.5 kg/h, it meets the needs of a wide range of gas-powered devices.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Type: Angled gas regulator

  • Output pressure: 37 mbar

  • Gas flow: 1.5 kg/h

  • Hose diameter: 9-10 mm

  • Hose length: 2 m

  • Thread: Left-threaded 1/2"

  • Standards: EN16129, EN12864

  • Accessories: Two clamp bands


Examples of Applications:



  • Supplying gas appliances in gastronomy, such as grills and stoves.

  • Technical work in workshops and industrial facilities.

  • Operating gas heating systems powered by cylinders.

description.name: Propane butane gas connection set – regulator with gauge, hose clamps and 2m hose
description.long_desc:
Connection Kit for Propane-Butane Gas


Equipped with a pressure gauge, this kit provides full control over the current gas pressure, enhancing safety and convenience.


Precise Regulation:
The regulator sets the pressure at 37 mbar, ensuring safe and stable operation of gas appliances.


Pressure Gauge:
The built-in pressure indicator allows continuous monitoring of the gas level in the cylinder, making it easier to plan replacements or refills.


Versatility:
The regulator fits hoses with a diameter of 9-10 mm, making it compatible with a wide range of gas installations.


Performance:
With a maximum gas flow of 1.5 kg/h, the regulator is suitable for various applications requiring higher gas demands.


Safety Standards:
Compliant with European standards EN16129 and EN12864, the product guarantees high-quality construction and safe use.


Durable Design:
Constructed from high-quality materials, it ensures long-lasting performance and reliable operation even in demanding conditions.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Output pressure: 37 mbar

  • Gas flow: 1.5 kg/h

  • Hose length: 2 m

  • Hose diameter: 9-10 mm

  • Features: Pressure gauge indicating current gas pressure

  • Accessories: Two clamp bands


Examples of Applications:



  • Powering gas appliances in gastronomy, such as gas stoves and grills.

  • Technical work in workshops and industrial facilities.

  • Operating heating devices powered by gas cylinders.

description.name: Propane-butane gas regulator 37mbar 1,5kg/h
description.long_desc:
The gas regulator by Geko is a robust and efficient tool designed for professional use in gas-powered systems. Its construction and compliance with EN16129 and EN12864 standards ensure safety and reliability in gastronomy, workshops, industrial applications, and domestic use.



  • Simple design: The gas regulator’s straightforward, classic design ensures easy installation and reliable operation in standard gas systems.

  • Precise regulation: The preset output pressure of 37 mbar enables stable and safe operation of gas devices.

  • Versatile application: Compatible with hoses of 9-10 mm diameter and equipped with a left-hand 1/2" thread, ensuring broad compatibility with gas systems.

  • Safety standards: Complies with European EN16129 and EN12864 standards, guaranteeing high-quality construction and safe operation.

  • High efficiency: A maximum gas flow of 1.5 kg/h meets the demands of a wide range of gas-powered devices.


Technical specifications



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Type: Angular gas regulator

  • Output pressure: 37 mbar

  • Gas flow: 1.5 kg/h

  • Hose diameter: 9-10 mm

  • Thread: Left-hand 1/2"

  • Standards: EN16129, EN12864


Examples of use:



  • Supplying gas devices in gastronomy, such as grills and stoves.

  • Technical work in workshops and industrial facilities.

  • Operating gas-powered heating systems supplied from cylinders.

  • Precise regulation: The preset output pressure of 37 mbar enables stable and safe operation of gas devices.

  • Versatile application: Compatible with hoses of 9-10 mm diameter and equipped with an internal left-hand 3/8" thread, ensuring compatibility with various gas systems.

  • Safety standards: Complies with European EN16129 and EN12864 standards, guaranteeing high-quality construction and safe operation.

  • High efficiency: A maximum gas flow of 1.5 kg/h meets the demands of a wide range of gas-powered devices.


Technical specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Type: Angular gas regulator

  • Output pressure: 37 mbar

  • Gas flow: 1.5 kg/h

  • Hose diameter: 9-10 mm

  • Thread: Internal left-hand 3/8"

  • Standards: EN16129, EN12864


Examples of use:



  • Supplying gas devices in gastronomy, such as grills and stoves.

  • Technical work in workshops and industrial facilities.

  • Operating gas-powered heating systems supplied from cylinders.

description.name: Propane-butane gas regulator with gauge 37mbar 1,5kg/h
description.long_desc:
The gas regulator by Geko is a robust and reliable solution for companies using gas cylinders in various applications such as gastronomy, workshops, or technical work. Equipped with a pressure gauge, it provides full control over the current gas pressure, increasing safety and convenience during use.



  • Precise regulation: The regulator sets the pressure at 37 mbar, enabling safe and stable operation of gas-powered devices.

  • Pressure gauge: The built-in pressure indicator allows continuous monitoring of the gas level in the cylinder, making it easier to plan replacements or refills.

  • Versatility: The regulator fits hoses with a diameter of 9-10 mm, making it compatible with a wide range of gas installations.

  • Efficiency: A maximum gas flow of 1.5 kg/h ensures the regulator is suitable for applications requiring higher gas consumption.

  • Safety standards: Complies with European EN16129 and EN12864 standards, guaranteeing high-quality construction and safe operation.

  • Durable construction: High-quality materials ensure long service life and reliable performance, even under demanding conditions.


Technical specifications:

  • Gas flow: 1.5 kg/h

  • Equipment: Pressure gauge indicating current gas pressure

  • Technical work in workshops and industrial facilities.

description.name: 1200W paint and mortar electric mixer with additional mixing paddle
description.long_desc:
The Geko 1200W electric mixer for paints and mortars is a multifunctional device designed for mixing various construction materials, such as paints, gypsum mortars, adhesives, plasters, and putties. With two operating modes, speed control, and additional mixers included in the set, it is an ideal solution for both professionals and individuals undertaking home renovations.


1200W motor – sufficient power for precise and quick mixing of most construction materials.
Two operating speeds:
Level I: Slow – perfect for heavy and dense materials, such as gypsum mortars or adhesives.
Level II: Fast – ideal for mixing paints, plasters, and other lighter substances.
Maximum rotation speed: 930 RPM – ensures quick and efficient mixing.
Speed control – allows for precise adjustment of speed to the type of material being mixed.
M14 thread – a standard thread compatible with various mixers available on the market.
Additional mixer included in the set:
Plaster mixer: Length 22 cm, diameter 11 cm – ideal for mixing various types of plasters, masonry mortars, and tile adhesives.
Gypsum mortar mixer: Length 16 cm, diameter 12 cm – designed for light mortars.
Total length with spindle: Up to 60 cm – perfect for working in deep containers.
Cable length: 2 m – provides convenience in various work environments.
Ergonomic design – a comfortable handle and lightweight construction make prolonged use easier.


Technical Specifications:
Manufacturer: Geko
Power supply: 230V~50Hz
Power: 1200W
2 operating modes:
Level I: Slow
Level II: Fast
Maximum rotation speed: 930 RPM
Thread: M14
Spindle: 35 cm
Total length (with spindle): Up to 60 cm
Cable: 2 m


Included in the Set:
Geko 1200W electric mixer
Two mixers:
For plasters (22 cm x 11 cm)
For gypsum mortars (16 cm x 12 cm)
Assembly wrenches – for easy tightening and loosening of mixers.
Spare carbon brushes – ensure longer device lifespan.

description.name: Chimney Sweep Ball with M12 nut 1,3 kg dia. 80 mm
description.long_desc:
The chimney ball with M12 nut is used as a weight for cleaning chimney flues. Thanks to its weight and design, it helps to effectively remove soot and other debris from inside the chimney. The M12 nut allows the ball to be easily connected to a chimney sweep or other cleaning tools.


Technical data



  • Diameter: 80 mm

  • Weight: 1,3 kg

  • Mounting thread: M12

description.name: Diamond disc for cutting and chamfering PVC pipes 125mm
description.long_desc:
The 125 mm diamond blade is an indispensable tool for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Specifically designed for cutting and chamfering PVC pipes and other plastics, it ensures fast, clean, and precise cuts without jagged edges.


Key Features:



  • Universal Application – Ideal for working with PVC, PP, PE, and other plastics

  • Diamond Technology – Ensures durability and efficient cutting

  • Chamfering Function – Saves time and eliminates the need for additional processing

  • High Rotational Speed – Up to 12,250 RPM, allowing for fast and accurate cutting

  • Mounting Hole 22.2 mm – Compatible with popular angle grinders


Technical Specifications:



  • Blade Diameter: 125 mm

  • Mounting Hole Diameter: 22.2 mm

  • Maximum Rotational Speed: 12,250 RPM

  • Application: Cutting and chamfering PVC pipes and other plastics

  • Mounting Type: Fits standard angle grinders


Application


The GEKO blade is the perfect solution for plumbers, electricians, ventilation specialists, and hobbyists. It performs exceptionally well in water, sewage, and ventilation system installations, ensuring precise and aesthetically pleasing pipe finishes.

description.name: Abrasive hoof trimming disc 125 mm (medium grit)
description.long_desc:
A high-quality trimming disc designed for the correction of hooves in cattle, sheep, goats, and hoof care for horses. The medium-grain working surface ensures precise, effective, and safe removal of excess horn material, eliminating the risk of overheating and tissue damage. Thanks to its ergonomic design and strategically placed ventilation holes, the disc minimizes heat buildup and ensures a comfortable working experience.


Key Features:



  • Medium-Grain Surface – Ideal for precise trimming and shaping of hooves

  • Efficient Blades – Specially designed cuts provide smooth, fast, and accurate grinding

  • Ventilation Holes – Reduce heat buildup and improve debris removal

  • Lightweight & Durable Design – Minimizes operator fatigue during extended use

  • Standard 22.2 mm Mounting Hole – Compatible with popular angle grinders

  • Animal-Safe – The design minimizes the risk of injuries and irritation


Technical Specifications:



  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Mounting Hole Diameter: 22.2 mm

  • Maximum Rotational Speed: 12,200 RPM

  • Grit Type: Medium-grain

  • Application: Hoof trimming and correction (cattle, horses, sheep, goats)

  • Compatibility: Angle grinders


Application


The hoof trimming disc is an essential tool for farmers, veterinarians, and professionals specializing in livestock and equine care. It is perfect for use in farms, stables, and professional veterinary clinics, ensuring optimal hoof health and animal well-being.

description.name: Diamond cutter 10mm M14
description.long_desc:
Diamond Milling Cutter 10 mm M14 – Precision and Durability for Demanding Professionals


The 10 mm diameter diamond milling cutter with an M14 mounting thread is a high-quality tool designed for precise processing of hard materials such as porcelain stoneware, ceramics, granite, and marble. Thanks to its 50 mm high diamond coating, the cutter ensures exceptional durability and efficiency, guaranteeing clean and precise cuts.


Key Features:



  • Diameter: 10 mm – Ideal for precision work, such as finishing holes and beveling edges.

  • M14 Thread – Compatible with popular angle grinders, making installation easy and ensuring work stability.

  • Diamond Working Surface – Provides long service life and high cutting efficiency, even on the hardest materials.

  • Diamond Coating Height: 50 mm – Increased durability and cutting performance.

  • Precision Manufacturing – Guarantees accurate processing and an aesthetically refined finish.

  • Versatile Application – Perfect for professional renovation, construction, and stoneworking tasks.


Applications:



  • Processing of porcelain stoneware, ceramics, porcelain, granite, and marble

  • Finishing edges and drilled holes

  • Construction and renovation work requiring precise cutting

description.name: Digital wall wire detector
description.long_desc:
Planning to drill into a wall and want to avoid unpleasant surprises?
Choose a professional digital wall detector that precisely identifies the presence of cables, pipes, and studs hidden in walls. It’s an essential tool for renovation, installation, and assembly work — both at home and on the job.


Technical Specifications:





























































Detection FunctionMaximum Detection Depth
Ferrous/Non-Ferrous Metals (e.g., steel, rebar)120 mm
Copper Pipes100 mm
Live Wires (AC)50 mm
Copper Wires (DC)40 mm
Wood (Precision Mode)20 mm
Wood (Deep Mode)38 mm
Other ParametersDetails
DisplayLED - backlit
Depth & Signal IndicatorYes
LED IndicatorsGreen / Yellow / Red
Audio SignalYes
Protective CaseYes
Power Supply1x 9V battery (included)

Why choose a GEKO brand detector?


Versatility and Precision


This detector allows you to accurately detect various materials inside walls:




  • Ferrous and non-ferrous metals (e.g., steel, copper) – up to 120 mm




  • Copper pipes – up to 100 mm




  • Live AC wires – up to 50 mm




  • DC copper wires – up to 40 mm




  • Wooden elements – up to 38 mm, with two modes:




    • Precision Mode: up to 20 mm




    • Deep Mode: up to 38 mm






With this, you gain full control over what lies beneath walls, floors, or ceilings.


Advanced Backlit LCD Display


A clear, backlit LCD screen ensures easy reading even in dark environments. The display shows:




  • Signal strength indicator (in %)




  • Estimated depth of the detected object




  • Precise location with a "Center" indicator




  • Battery level and current operating mode




Ready to Use Right Out of the Box


The set includes a 9V battery (6F22) and a protective hook-and-loop case, so you can start working immediately and store the device safely afterward.


Set Includes:



  • Digital wall detector

  • 6F22 9V battery

  • Protective hook-and-loop case

  • User manual

  • Original box with informational graphics

description.name: Tungsten carbide cutter set 6pcs
description.long_desc:
A set of six rotary burrs that combine precision craftsmanship with durability, meeting the demands of professionals in the metalworking industry. High-quality materials and a variety of burr shapes make this set an indispensable tool for metalworking and industrial applications.



  • Designed for steel: The burrs are made of durable tungsten carbide, ensuring effectiveness when working with hard materials, including steel.

  • Variety of shapes: The set includes burrs in spherical, oval, cylindrical, cylindrical-rounded, conical, and pointed arch shapes, enabling a wide range of tasks – from precise finishing to intensive material removal.

  • Durability and efficiency: Resistant to high speeds (up to 30,000 RPM) and wear, these burrs provide long life and excellent machining results.

  • Universal shank: A 6 mm diameter with a cylindrical shank ensures compatibility with most standard milling machines and drills.

  • Safe storage: The burrs are housed in a durable, lockable plastic case, protecting them from damage and facilitating organization.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Purpose: Steel machining

  • Number of pieces: 6

  • Types of burrs: Spherical, oval, cylindrical, cylindrical-rounded, conical, pointed arch

  • Shank diameter: 6 mm

  • Shank type: Cylindrical

  • Material: Tungsten carbide

  • Maximum speed: 30,000 RPM

  • Packaging: Lockable plastic case


Applications:



  • Precise finishing of steel components.

  • Material removal in industrial and production workshops.

  • Professional steel machining in mechanical and artisanal facilities.

description.name: M14 50mm diamond cutting and engraving discs
description.long_desc:
Diamond cutting disc 50 mm with M14 mounting thread is an innovative tool designed for professionals who demand the highest precision and durability in their work. This product stands out for its high-quality diamond segment, which enables efficient cutting of even the most challenging materials.


Product features:



  • Disc diameter: 50 mm – perfect for precise tasks.

  • Disc thickness: 2 mm – ensures precise and smooth cutting without damaging the material.

  • Diamond layer height: 6 mm – guarantees long lifespan and high cutting efficiency.

  • Mounting spindle: internal M14 thread – allows easy installation in an angle grinder.

description.name: M14 diamond conical mill drill 2-38mm
description.long_desc:
The Diamond Cone Milling Cutter 2-38 mm M14 is a professional tool designed for the precise processing of various construction materials. With its conical design featuring a diameter range from 2 mm to 38 mm and a durable diamond coating, this milling cutter is perfect for working with hard materials. The internal M14 thread ensures compatibility with angle grinders.


Product Features:



  • Diameter range: 2-38 mm – ideal for a wide range of applications requiring precise adjustments.

  • Mounting system: internal M14 thread – ensures easy and stable attachment to devices.

  • Conical design: allows for precise hole enlargement and edge chamfering.

  • Diamond coating: ensures durability and performance, even during intensive use.


Product Benefits:



  • Versatile applications thanks to the conical design and wide diameter range.

  • High durability and wear resistance due to the diamond finish.

  • Ease of use with M14 thread compatibility.

  • Ideal for tasks requiring precision and aesthetic finishing.


Example Applications:



  • Edge and hole processing in ceramic tiles, porcelain stoneware, and natural stone.

  • Shaping decorative details in construction and finishing materials.

  • Creating precise conical recesses in stone, concrete, and other hard surfaces.

description.name: Long HSS DIN1869 3.0 x 150mm gold metal twist drill bit
description.long_desc:
A high-quality metal drill bit that meets the expectations of both DIY enthusiasts and professionals. Made from high-speed steel (HSS), it offers not only excellent durability but also high drilling precision. Thanks to its extended design, it allows work in areas inaccessible to standard drill bits and enables the drilling of unusually deep holes.


With a specially ground 130° tip, the bit effectively centers itself on the surface, minimizing the risk of slipping when starting the drilling process. This feature is particularly important when working with harder materials such as structural steel, non-ferrous metals, cast iron, or plastics.


Additionally, the drill bit’s golden color not only gives it an aesthetic appearance but also indicates increased wear resistance and reduced friction during drilling, resulting in longer tool life.


Technical Specifications:



  • Diameter: 3.0 mm

  • Total Length: 150 mm

  • Working Length: 100 mm

  • Tip Angle: 130°

  • Type: HSS DIN1869 – long drill bit


Key Product Features:



  • Material: High-speed steel (HSS) – ensures exceptional durability and wear resistance.

  • Precise Geometry: 130° ground tip for easy centering and improved drilling efficiency.

  • Extended Design: Complies with DIN1869 standard for greater reach and drilling in hard-to-access areas.

  • Versatile Use: Ideal for working with steel, cast iron, non-ferrous metals, and plastics.

  • Enhanced Durability: Gold-colored coating reduces friction and improves heat resistance.
